basicInformation.name: Devarapalli Sairam
basicInformation.d: working in APSSDC,Having 4 years of experience in training students in engineering colleges throughout Andhra Pradesh on various technologies and tools(Scratch, MIT AppInventor, Raptor, HTML5, CSS3, JS, PWA's, Python, Machine Learning, GIT and Github) Trained more than 4000 students so far in short term and long term training programs in engineering colleges. Trained different school students and ASPIRE Trainers in AP and The​ ​training​ ​was​ ​reached​ ​to​ ​​1,24,768​​(students​+faculties) ​and​ ​helped​ ​them​ ​to​ ​develop  in​ ​the​ ​aspects​ ​of​ ​Computational​ ​Thinking,​ ​development​ ​of​ ​logical​ ​abilities,  building​ ​of​ ​innovative​ ​projects​ ​in​ ​the​ ​genres​ ​like​ ​Animations,​ ​Games,  Subject​ ​concepts,​ ​Storyboards,​ ​Greeting​ ​cards,​ ​etc in Scratch and MIT tolls.

education.institution: EVM college of engineering and technology

skills: Source Code Management using Git and Github
Data Analysis and Data Visualization with Python
Machine Learning with Python Web Development using python
cert: Front End Web Developer Nanodegree from Udacity
